groupid.desc: Group id, 0 means that the function will determine the user group

value.desc: The contents for the field always JSON encoded.

data.desc: The fields data to be created

newentryid.desc: True new created entry id. 0 if the entry was not created.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

approve.desc: Whether to approve (true) or unapprove the entry.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

status.desc: Always true. If we see this field it means that the entry was deleted.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.name: mod_data_get_data_access_information

groupid.desc: Group id, 0 means that the function will determine the user group.

canaddentry.desc: Whether the user can add entries or not.

canmanageentries.desc: Whether the user can manage entries or not.

canapprove.desc: Whether the user can approve entries or not.

timeavailable.desc: Whether the database is available or not by time restrictions.

inreadonlyperiod.desc: Whether the database is in read mode only.

numentries.desc: The number of entries the current user added.

entrieslefttoadd.desc: The number of entries left to complete the activity.

entrieslefttoview.desc: The number of entries left to view other users entries.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Return access information for a given database.

functions.name: mod_data_get_databases_by_courses

introformat.desc: intro format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for the external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description:
Returns a list of database instances in a provided set of courses, if
            no courses are provided then all the database instances the user has access to will be returned.

functions.name: mod_data_get_entries

groupid.desc: Group id, 0 means that the function will determine the user group

returncontents.desc:
Whether to return contents or not. This will return each entry
                                                        raw contents and the complete list view (using the template).

sort.desc:
Sort the records by this field id, reserved ids are:
                                                0: timeadded
                                                -1: firstname
                                                -2: lastname
                                                -3: approved
                                                -4: timemodified.
                                                Empty for using the default database setting.

order.desc:
The direction of the sorting: 'ASC' or 'DESC'.
                                                Empty for using the default database setting.

page.desc: The page of records to return.

perpage.desc: The number of records to return per page

userid.desc: The id of the user who created the record.

groupid.desc: The group id this record belongs to (0 for no groups).

dataid.desc: The database id this record belongs to.

timemodified.desc: Last time the record was modified.

approved.desc: Whether the entry has been approved (if the database is configured in that way).

canmanageentry.desc: Whether the current user can manage this entry

fullname.desc: The user who created the entry fullname.

fieldid.desc: The field type of the content.

recordid.desc: The record this content belongs to.

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for the external files.

rawname.desc: The raw, unnormalised name for the tag as entered by users.

taginstancecontextid.desc: Context the tag instance belongs to.

flag.desc: Whether the tag is flagged as inappropriate.

totalfilesize.desc: Total size (bytes) of the files included in the records.

listviewcontents.desc: The list view contents as is rendered in the site.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Return the complete list of entries of the given database.

canviewall.desc: Whether the user can view all the individual ratings.

canviewany.desc: Whether the user can view aggregate of ratings of others.

name.desc: Scale name (when a real scale is used).

items.desc: Scale items. Only returned for not numerical scales.

Field key for search.

Sort the records by this field id, reserved ids are:
                                                0: timeadded
                                                -1: firstname
                                                -2: lastname

                                                -4: timemodified.
                                                Empty for using the default database setting.

The direction of the sorting: 'ASC' or 'DESC'.
                                                Empty for using the default database setting.

page.desc: The page of records to return.
